products.title: Burst Grey Mist Vertical Blind
products.description: The burst grey mist vertical blind is a brilliant grey colour. The fabric has a slight texture to it and as it is a dimout material this helps to gently filter the light passing through it. This light grey colour is great for neutral coloured homes or offices. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Burst Graphite Vertical Blind
products.description: The burst graphite is true to the name as very deep grey-blue colour. The dark tone of this blind is one that works best as a contrast to lighter interiors but could be used in a room of rich browns, reds and gold colours. Be aware that this is a dark toned fabric and can easily be overbearing in the wrong room. Ideal for bathrooms and kitchens, this is a dimout fabric which will filter the light entering your room.

products.title: Burst Shark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Firm and unyielding, the burst shark grey stands its ground in the window, keeping you safe from peeking eyes and burning sunlight. With such a dark neutral colour, we highly recommend pairing it with a brighter decor, preferably pastel primary colours that add an accent but don't try to beat the rock in a contest of strength, which they would most likely lose. Alternatively, used it to bridge a monochromatic scheme and take the edge out of the white/black contrast.

products.title: Burst Polished Stone Vertical Blind
products.description: The light burst polished stone is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor. The lighter grey will help enhance and lift the room. Use this across your home as the dimout fabric will gently filter the light, giving your room a warming glow. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Woven Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being simout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Dolphin Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Add a darker grey tone to your room with the amor dolphin grey blackout roller blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.

products.title: Amor Antique Steel Vertical Blind
products.description: A soft, light grey that doesn't try too hard to stand out, the antique steel colour is a beautifully understated blind that just quietly gets on with the job of blocking out direct sunlight without too much fanfare. Used to mellow the palettes of brightly coloured rooms, the antique steel is suitable for literally any room of the house. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Washed Pebble Vertical Blind
products.description: Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

products.title: Amor Grey Mist Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Amor Shark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: The deeper grey colour of the amor shark grey is one that will certainly make a statement in any room. Whether going in a bedroom, living room or bathroom this blind will fit in anywhere. This blind works especially well in modern interiors in place of black. products.title: Amor Soft Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: The light grey amor soft grey is a blind that suits a more natural looking room. Shades of stone and creams work well with this fabric but also as a contrast to darker tones of blue, brown and purple. This fabric is inoffensive and would suit any number of rooms. The amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, bathrooms and kitchens. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Ritz Steely Grey Vertical Blind

products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Vertical
products.description: The pale, lilac mist colour is best used in a room where you want the blind to blend in with the rest of the room. Use this with similar pastel tones. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Gibson Powder Grey Vertical
products.description: The lighter grey tone in the gibson powder grey is perfect for use in bathrooms or bedrooms. The vertical slats tilt so you have total control over the light entering your room. This 100% polyester fabric is tough and soft to the touch, fire retardant, moisture resistant, blackout and wipe clean. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Stoney Rock Vertical Blind
products.description: The lighter grey colour of the kerry stoney rock is perfect for adding into a more neutral and toned down decor. This blind is great for pairing against lighter grey decors and for blending into the background. This blind is also perfect for bedrooms as the blackout fabric will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.description: The dark grey of the kerry charcoal is perfect for adding as darker and mysterious tone to your windows, or pairing in with a darker grey feature wall in your home. This is a blackout fabric so will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Use this in your bedroom if you're woken by the early morning sun or bright streetlamps outside your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Dark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: The kerry dark grey is probably the colour that would come to mind when someone says the words 'dark grey' to you. With this in mind, we do offer free samples of all their fabrics, but equally, if you're looking for a dark grey blind - this is probably it. Being blackout means this is perfect for your bedroom too as it will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.
